snippet.title: MD Yoshi in Sonic The Hedgehog 2
snippet.description:
Support Shiryu on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/Shiryu
https://www.facebook.com/ShiryuVideoGames/

Now this is one of the most impressive hacks I have ever seen and it is "only" a WIP from Xenowhirl for the Sonic Hacking Contest 2010. this thign not only drops Yoshi in the game, it actually emulates a lot of "Yoshi's Island" gameplay mechanics in what truly is a huge feat! I won't spoil them for you, enjoy the video with the first two levels. Impressive work!

Romhacking.net Project page:  n/a
